original_title: W.A.S.P. : ReIdolized (The Soundtrack to the Crimson Idol)
overview: A mostly black-and-white, narrated dramatization of WASP's 1992 album The Crimson Idol, filmed in 1992 and finally released with the 2017 re-recording as the soundtrack.
tagline: The Soundtrack to THE CRIMSON IDOL!
title: W.A.S.P. : ReIdolized (The Soundtrack to the Crimson Idol)
